name: Runestone Castle (Jam Ver)
description:
Press WASD/Arrow keys to move, mouse button to fire. Press F to change ammunition type. Every combination works and is a little bit different. 
First jam ever so didn't time manage as much as I want to. Will probably keep working on this as time goes on because I think the base mechanics actually came out pretty cool.

Software used: Aesprite, GameMaker 8.1

V1.0 is the version that was uploaded before the cutoff time of 11:00AM, but has bugs in almost every aspect of the enemy mechanics due to the enemy movement system not matching up with how I had previously coded the status effects system. These problems are fixed in V1.2, but V1.0 is still available for download for the sake of transparency. V1.2.1 fixes some other minor bugs.
